title: Going nuclear
description:
Jessica Lovering joins Matt to discuss nuclear power's role in combatting climate change.
Guest: 
Jessica Lovering, (@J_Lovering) Fellow, Energy for Growth
Host:
Matthew Yglesias (@mattyglesias), Senior correspondent, Vox
More to explore:
